page.title: 13THE VILAGE POLICEMAN
page.content: St Margarets police station is on the Droveway, not far from the school. It is a county police station with an office and a police house attached. The policeman's name is Steve Grayland and he lives in the police house with his family. His area of policing is in St Margaret's and Kingsdown. On a visit there we met him. He seemed very friendly and jovial. His main areas of work are patrolling the village by foot, car or motor bike. He usually rides the motor bike. The most crime in the area is robbery and vandalism.Sometimes he has to call Dover CID when a robbery occurs in the village.He hardly ever has to use his truncheon and he said that at times his job becomes quite monotonous_just plodding the beat and writing reports.
